Topic.Title: Loving every minute of my FREE SPEECH doctrine! I am now in ongoing negotiations with TEAM.

Message.Msg: Team will fake rec you down for using your free speech. Don't ever question why out Team can't win against "all one poster".

Topic.Title: Good Morning From Wonderful Philadelphia. Sorry Doppel, You're No Gina Or Shack

Message.Title: POST OF THE YEAR = "agqut, Gina, Shack, and countless others were......, ME!!!!!"
Message.Msg: "agqut, Gina, Shack, and countless others were......, ME!!!!!" by angel.madbezos "My agqut character really impressed even myself ....the most! Watching Charlie and Midnight attack agqut (who was actually me!) was most rewarding and satisfying for me at the end. I set it up that way! Most all of my characters (ids) served their intended purposes. I hope this helps. psssst .....who is the poor loner who sat here all day yesterday under 3 different names?!! All alone and no one replying?!! Life as we know IT? OUCH "

Message.Title: Good Morning Fellow Ebayers
Message.Msg: Life is what you make of it Ebay is also what you make of it Be honest and you'll be rewarded
